=== _Options window (user preference):_===

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/parrotPresference.jpg


  *Personal Profile

   In this section you can modify :

   -your personal message.

   -your status.

   -your avatar picture.

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/personalProfile2.jpg

  *Manage Accounts

   you can modify all your chatty account in this section:

   -Add new Account

   -Remove old Account

   -Edit Account

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/manageAccount2.jpg

  *Features Settings

   In this section, you can:

   -Enable ChatBot

   -Enable Sound Notification

   -Enable ChatLog

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/featureSetting3.jpg

  *Preference

   -in this section you can chage your Parrot-IM skin

http://parrot-im.googlecode.com/files/Preference1.jpg
